meta.name: 10 Things to Know About
meta.description: This six-part award winning series returns, with Fergus McAuliffe, Amy Hassett and Kathriona Devereux showcasing the Irish science behind aspects of modern life.

videos.title: Bacteria
videos.overview: Bacteria are one of Earth's oldest life forms - dating back over 3 billion years. They're masters of survival and good bacteria help nature function, but some bacteria cause infection and can be deadly
